item.title: Bungalow row RLD supporters clash with police
item.description: Ajit Singhs supporters on Thursday clashed with police while protesting against Centres move to evict him from official residence in Delhi while the RLD chief demanded that the house be converted into a memorial to his father former prime minister Charan Singh
item.itunes:subtitle: Ajit Singhs supporters on Thursday clashed with police while protesting against Centres move to evict him from official residence in Delhi while the RLD chief demanded that the house be converted into a memorial to his father former prime minister Charan
item.itunes:summary: Ajit Singhs supporters on Thursday clashed with police while protesting against Centres move to evict him from official residence in Delhi while the RLD chief demanded that the house be converted into a memorial to his father former prime minister Charan Singh

item.title: Boy tutor slaps to death kid in Bihars Begusarai
item.description: A 15yearold boy who teaches kids to raise money to finance his own education slapped to death a class 6 student just a year younger than him following an alleged dispute over the teaching skills of the part time tutor

item.title: Modi govts fast decisions made after lengthy debates
item.description: The new NDA government is getting known for its style of fast policymaking but these decisions are reached after marathon deliberations say government officials
item.itunes:subtitle: The new NDA government is getting known for its style of fast policymaking but these decisions are reached after marathon deliberations say government officials
item.itunes:summary: The new NDA government is getting known for its style of fast policymaking but these decisions are reached after marathon deliberations say government officials

item.title: Noida Girl students protest spy cam found in hostel
item.description: Girl students of a JSS college held a demonstration on Thursday after a spy camera was found in a washroom of the girls hostel College management has ordered inquiry and lodged FIR against unknown persons
item.itunes:subtitle: Girl students of a JSS college held a demonstration on Thursday after a spy camera was found in a washroom of the girls hostel College management has ordered inquiry and lodged FIR against unknown persons
item.itunes:summary: Girl students of a JSS college held a demonstration on Thursday after a spy camera was found in a washroom of the girls hostel College management has ordered inquiry and lodged FIR against unknown persons

item.title: Hema draws flak for Mathura widow comments
item.description: The Congress on Thursday sharply reacted to BJP MP from Mathura and film actress Hema Malini for her remarks against widows of West Bengal and Bihar living in VrindavanMathura for a long time
item.itunes:subtitle: The Congress on Thursday sharply reacted to BJP MP from Mathura and film actress Hema Malini for her remarks against widows of West Bengal and Bihar living in VrindavanMathura for a long time
item.itunes:summary: The Congress on Thursday sharply reacted to BJP MP from Mathura and film actress Hema Malini for her remarks against widows of West Bengal and Bihar living in VrindavanMathura for a long time

item.title: Sena refuses to climb down on seatsharing with BJP
item.description: The Shiv Sena on Thursday refused to climb down on seatsharing negotiations with the Bharatiya Janata Party for the Maharashtra polls further straining one of Indias oldest political coalitions hours after BJP president Amit Shah asked allies to meet his party halfway
item.itunes:subtitle: The Shiv Sena on Thursday refused to climb down on seatsharing negotiations with the Bharatiya Janata Party for the Maharashtra polls further straining one of Indias oldest political coalitions hours after BJP president Amit Shah asked allies to meet his
item.itunes:summary: The Shiv Sena on Thursday refused to climb down on seatsharing negotiations with the Bharatiya Janata Party for the Maharashtra polls further straining one of Indias oldest political coalitions hours after BJP president Amit Shah asked allies to meet his party halfway

item.title: Shah asks party workers to make Maharashtra BJPyukt ignores Sena
item.description: Hours after he asked Shiv Sena to walk two steps forward BJP president Amit Shah chose to ignore alliance partner in his address and instead appealed workers to work hard and ensure partys victory an indication of strained ties with Shiv Sena over seat sharingnbspSena refuses to climb down on seatsharing with BJP
item.itunes:subtitle: Hours after he asked Shiv Sena to walk two steps forward BJP president Amit Shah chose to ignore alliance partner in his address and instead appealed workers to work hard and ensure partys victory an indication of strained ties with Shiv Sena over seat sh
item.itunes:summary: Hours after he asked Shiv Sena to walk two steps forward BJP president Amit Shah chose to ignore alliance partner in his address and instead appealed workers to work hard and ensure partys victory an indication of strained ties with Shiv Sena over seat sharingnbspSena refuses to climb down on seatsharing with BJP

item.title: India China ink 12 pacts 20 billion investment in next 5 years
item.description: China has pledged on Thursday to invest 20 billion in India in the next five years besides allowing greater market access to Indian companies in sectors like pharmaceutical and farmproducts
item.itunes:subtitle: China has pledged on Thursday to invest 20 billion in India in the next five years besides allowing greater market access to Indian companies in sectors like pharmaceutical and farmproducts
item.itunes:summary: China has pledged on Thursday to invest 20 billion in India in the next five years besides allowing greater market access to Indian companies in sectors like pharmaceutical and farmproducts

item.title: JK floods hit marriage plans in Valley
item.description: A deluge and subsequent floods in the state have delivered a blow to wedding plans of many While some had to cancel their engagements others had no option but say I do in lowkey events amid the destruction unleashed by killer floods
item.itunes:subtitle: A deluge and subsequent floods in the state have delivered a blow to wedding plans of many While some had to cancel their engagements others had no option but say I do in lowkey events amid the destruction unleashed by killer floods
item.itunes:summary: A deluge and subsequent floods in the state have delivered a blow to wedding plans of many While some had to cancel their engagements others had no option but say I do in lowkey events amid the destruction unleashed by killer floods

item.title: Modi talks tough with Chinas president Xi on border row
item.description: Narendra Modi pushed Chinas president for an early resolution to their festering border dispute on Thursday robust comments that overshadowed a Chinese pledge of 20 billion in investments and support for Indias greater role in the United Nations Security Council
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modi pushed Chinas president for an early resolution to their festering border dispute on Thursday robust comments that overshadowed a Chinese pledge of 20 billion in investments and support for Indias greater role in the United Nations Security
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modi pushed Chinas president for an early resolution to their festering border dispute on Thursday robust comments that overshadowed a Chinese pledge of 20 billion in investments and support for Indias greater role in the United Nations Security Council

item.title: Relief for Uttarakhand flood victims make slow start now
item.description: More than a year after rains led to unprecedented death and destruction in the hill state of Uttarakhand UK Uttar Pradesh UP is still busy sorting out its dead spread across 60 districts As the state grapples with numbers from initial figure of 5500 the missingdead were vetted down to 2500 then to 1956 and 1150 before settling for 948 only to see a recent addition of three more names hundreds of victims despite having got the death certificate of the near ones still await the promised Rs 55 lakh exgratia
item.itunes:subtitle: More than a year after rains led to unprecedented death and destruction in the hill state of Uttarakhand UK Uttar Pradesh UP is still busy sorting out its dead spread across 60 districts As the state grapples with numbers from initial figure of 5500 the m

item.title: Bihar teen arrested in case preceding his birth
item.description: In a case of mistaken identity an 18yearold man in north Bihar was arrested by the police in connection with an incident of arson that took place a year before he was born The man identified by a single name Rajkumar was arrested earlier this week at Makhnupur village in north Bihar
item.itunes:subtitle: In a case of mistaken identity an 18yearold man in north Bihar was arrested by the police in connection with an incident of arson that took place a year before he was born The man identified by a single name Rajkumar was arrested earlier this week at Makh
item.itunes:summary: In a case of mistaken identity an 18yearold man in north Bihar was arrested by the police in connection with an incident of arson that took place a year before he was born The man identified by a single name Rajkumar was arrested earlier this week at Makhnupur village in north Bihar

item.title: CBI chief row Bhushan wont name whistleblower
item.description: LawyerAAP leader Prashant Bhushannbsp refused to reveal thenbspsource who provided him thenbspCBI chiefsnbspguest list The whistleblowers life will be in danger his NGO told the Supreme Court

item.title: States may take call on townships near sanctuaries
item.description: In a boost to the real estate sector the environment ministry may soon allow state governments to take a call on setting up new townships and information technology and developmental parks near tiger reserves national parks ecosensitive zones and critically polluted areas
item.itunes:subtitle: In a boost to the real estate sector the environment ministry may soon allow state governments to take a call on setting up new townships and information technology and developmental parks near tiger reserves national parks ecosensitive zones and critical
item.itunes:summary: In a boost to the real estate sector the environment ministry may soon allow state governments to take a call on setting up new townships and information technology and developmental parks near tiger reserves national parks ecosensitive zones and critically polluted areas

item.title: JK Civil Secretariat reopens not operational yet
item.description: Civil Secretariat the seat of Jammu and Kashmir opened on Thursday after 11 days but could not become operational as the ground floor of the sevenstorey building is still under three feet of water Ministers reach out to floodhit populace of Kashmir Valley
item.itunes:subtitle: Civil Secretariat the seat of Jammu and Kashmir opened on Thursday after 11 days but could not become operational as the ground floor of the sevenstorey building is still under three feet of water Ministers reach out to floodhit populace of Kashmir Valley
